name: Eironn
description: A Rogue skilled at attracting enemies and working well with allies who can deal AoE damage.

ultimate.name: Elemental Realm
ultimate.description: Eironn combines the power of two swords and selects a tile, pulling in enemies within 2 tiles to the center. Then causes an explosion after a short delay, dealing 250% damage to enemies within 2 tiles and immobilizing them for 3s. Eironn prioritize choosing a tile with the mostsurroundine enemies.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases damage to 270%.
Increases damage to 290%.
Increases damage to 310%.
Increases damage to 330%.

skill_1.name: Ice Spike
skill_1.description: Eironn slashes to deal 110% damage to enemies within a 3-tile arc and reduces their Haste by 50 for 5s. Later, Eironn stabs the target, deals 220% damage to the target and enemies standing in a line within 2 tiles, and decreases their Magic DEF by 40% for 5s.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the damage of slash to 115% and the damage of stab to 230%.
Increases the damage of slash to 120% and the damage of stab to 240%.
Increases the damage of slash to 125% and the damage of stab to 250%.

skill_2.name: Elemental Barrier
skill_2.description: Eironn gains a shield that blocks 280% damage for 10s, Additionaly, Eironn gains 50% Dodge Rate while the shield is active.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases shield value to 300%.
Increases shield value to 320%.
The Dodge Rate bonus is increased to 80%.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Eironn increases his Ranged DEF by 15 during battle. He gains an extra 50% Ranged DEF when his HP drops below 7.

upgrades.upgrade: Eironn increases his Ranged DEF by 19 during battle. He gains an extra 9 Ranged DEF when his HP drops below 50%.
Eironn increases his Ranged DEF by 23 during battle. He gains an extra 12 Ranged DEF when his HP drops below 50%.

ex_skill.name: Howling Hurricane
ex_skill.description: Eironn's first casting of Ultimate in battles does not consume Energy, but the damage is reduced to 50% of the original damage.

upgrades.upgrade: The damage is reduced to 70% of the original.
Increases immobilize duration to 6s.
The damage is reduced to 80% of the original.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Eironn reduces an extra 15% Magic DEF on an immobilized target if they are immobilized by Elemental Realm.

season_skill.name: Combo
season_skill.description: After casting the Ultimate, deals 125% damage to the current target with each of the next 4 skill casts or normal attacks.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the skill damage dealt to 130%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 135%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 140%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 145%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 150%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 155%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 160%.
